about_the_game:
They are coming !

Protect your base and fend off hordes of relentless robots !

Tau Cubis is a 3D Sci-Fi Tower Defense game, taking inspiration from the classic 'Defense Grid' with extra features (collaborative Towers, advanced targeting system, truly autonomous enemies).

Tau Cubis offers different Map types and you will need to adapt your strategy.

Some maps will rather test your skills in "Mazing Tower Defense", while others will require you to manage your resources well and find the most effective combinations of Towers.

Smart Towers

  • Your Towers collaborate, buffing each other.

  • Your Towers can be assigned a global priority target type in real time :
    Just one click for all Towers to target in priority a specific enemy type.

    "Mazing" Tower Defense game

  • Each enemy is truly autonomous and there is no predefined path !

  • Your choices immediately modify the dynamic of the fight for the whole map.

    111 challenges !

  • Each map is playable in 4 to 8 Modes for 111 Challenges .

    Leaderboards

  • Compare Your score to the best scores or just your Friends' through the Steam Leaderboards.

    Notes from me :)

  • Please, keep in mind, Tau Cubis is a solo game development, is not story driven and does not feature cinematic.

  • The more challenges you complete, the more Towers, Enemies and Maps you unlock.

  • Tau Cubis is inspired by other games and especially the amazing franchise : Defense Grid.

  • I'd like to offer you a minimalist strategic Tower Defense game with colorful graphics and smart mechanics :)

  • Full Controller, Mouse and Keyboard (WASD control or classic ) : your choice !

  • Quick to learn, easy to play for intense 20 minute session.

  • Online leaderboards, but you still can play offline and upload your scores later.

    Don't hesitate for any questions or feedback at taucubis@cubemandarine.com or in Steam Discussion section !
